description: This seminar is taught in Washington D.C. for students enrolled in the Washington Semester Program. It includes an orientation to observation and research in the Washington Community and a major independent research project on the politics of governance.
name: The Politics of Government in Washington Community

section.name: The Politics of Government in Washington Community

values.comments: Students seem to have enjoyed this class, with most students calling both the course and professor “great” or “excellent.”  Evaluators said the course was well designed, with field trips and guest speakers being positive additions.

values.name: The Politics of Government in Washington Community
